# Function: useField()

```ts
function useField<
  TParentData,
  TName,
  TData,
  TOnMount,
  TOnChange,
  TOnChangeAsync,
  TOnBlur,
  TOnBlurAsync,
  TOnSubmit,
  TOnSubmitAsync,
  TFormOnMount,
  TFormOnChange,
  TFormOnChangeAsync,
  TFormOnBlur,
  TFormOnBlurAsync,
  TFormOnSubmit,
  TFormOnSubmitAsync,
  TFormOnServer,
  TPatentSubmitMeta,
>(
  opts,
): FieldApi<
  TParentData,
  TName,
  TData,
  TOnMount,
  TOnChange,
  TOnChangeAsync,
  TOnBlur,
  TOnBlurAsync,
  TOnSubmit,
  TOnSubmitAsync,
  TFormOnMount,
  TFormOnChange,
  TFormOnChangeAsync,
  TFormOnBlur,
  TFormOnBlurAsync,
  TFormOnSubmit,
  TFormOnSubmitAsync,
  TFormOnServer,
  TPatentSubmitMeta
> &
  ReactFieldApi<
    TParentData,
    TFormOnMount,
    TFormOnChange,
    TFormOnChangeAsync,
    TFormOnBlur,
    TFormOnBlurAsync,
    TFormOnSubmit,
    TFormOnSubmitAsync,
    TFormOnServer,
    TPatentSubmitMeta
  >;
```

A hook for managing a field in a form.
